src/222cube.h

00001 #ifndef _222CUBE_H
00002 #define _222CUBE_H
00003 
00004 #include <stdint.h>
00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 
00007 /*********************
00008  *
00009  * 2x2x2 cube representation
00010  *
00011  * for Brutha
00012  *
00013  * by Michal Hordecki
00014  *
00015  *********************/
00016 
00017 /************
00018  * Cube representation structure:
00019  *
00020  * There are 5 bits, at different positions, dedicated to each position on the 2x2x2.
00021  * For each position, there are 2 pieces of information stored:
00022  *
00023  * - Which cubie is in this position? (1 of 8 = 3 bits)
00024  * - What's the orientation of this cubie? (1 of 3 = 2 bits)
00025  *
00026  * Which totals in 5 bit each and 40 for the whole cube.
00027  * In each such group orientation info comes first.
00028  *
00029  * First criterion is probably self explanatory (see #defs below), but for
00030  * second I think there should be some kind of clarifying:
00031  * 
00032  * Corner orientation can be one of these three types:
00033  *
00034  * 0 - facing U/D face
00035  * 1 - facing F/B face
00036  * 2 - facing R/L face
00037  *
00038  * 
00039  *
00040  */
00041 
00042 typedef struct
00043 {
00044         uint64_t corners;
00045 } Cube;
00046 
00047 typedef Cube (*MovePtr)(const Cube&);
00048 struct Move
00049 {
00050         MovePtr fun;
00051         const char *name;
00052         int index;
00053 };
00054 
00055 //Corner offsets
00056 #define UFR 0
00057 #define URB 5
00058 #define UBL 10
00059 #define ULF 15
00060 
00061 #define DRF 20
00062 #define DFL 25
00063 #define DLB 30
00064 #define DBR 35
00065 
00066 // Cubies
00067 #define CUFR 0
00068 #define CURB 1
00069 #define CUBL 2
00070 #define CULF 3
00071 
00072 #define CDRF 4
00073 #define CDFL 5
00074 #define CDLB 6
00075 #define CDBR 7
00076 
00077 // Helper functions
00078 
00079 //Trigger bit
00080 #define trig(x, y) (x) ^= (((uint64_t)1)<<(uint64_t)(y))
00081 
00082 //Read bit
00083 #define bitread(x, y) ((x) & (((uint64_t)1)<<((uint64_t)(y))))
00084 
00085 //Read corner orientation (check for 0/ check for 1/ check for 2)
00086 #define rOC2(x, y) ((x) & (1<<(y+1)))
00087 #define rOC1(x, y) ((x) & (1<<(y)))
00088 #define rOC0(x, y) (!(rOC1((x), (y)) | rOC2((x), (y))))
00089 #define rOC(x, y) (((x) & (3<<(y)))>>(y))
00090 
00091 
00092 Cube cube_ideal();
00093 
00094 bool operator==(const Cube &a, const Cube &b);
00095 
00096 bool operator<(const Cube &a, const Cube &b);
00097 
00098 Cube moveR(const Cube &state);
00099 Cube moveRp(const Cube &state);
00100 
00101 Cube moveU(const Cube &state);
00102 Cube moveUp(const Cube &state);
00103 
00104 Cube moveF(const Cube &state);
00105 Cube moveFp(const Cube &state);
00106 
00107 Cube moveL(const Cube &state);
00108 Cube moveLp(const Cube &state);
00109 
00110 Cube moveD(const Cube &state);
00111 Cube moveDp(const Cube &state);
00112

00114 Cube moveBp(const Cube &state);
